title: Fabulous 5 Bedroom 3.5 Bathroom; WD, hardwood; granite
posting_body: Fabulous renovated 5 Bedroom 3.5 Bathroom house in Ballard Loyal Heights.
Kitchen has a stainless steel appliances and granite counters including dishwasher, stove, oven, and microwave
Large living room and dining room
Master Bedroom with huge walk in closet and large ensuite bathroom with two sinks, shower with multiple shower heads and whirlpool tub.
Master bedroom also has a fireplace and a lovely view of the mountains.
Another bedroom upstairs with a ensuite bathroom
Two other bedrooms share a bathroom upstairs
Powder bathroom on main level with slate floors
Lots of off street parking on the driveway at the back of the house
Top rated schools in Loyal Heights
Easy access to downtown Seattle, Ballard, North Seattle, Northgate Mall, University of Washington, North Seattle Community college, Amazon, Boeing, etc
Group of friends (young professionals, students) welcome to apply
